_@vfxchris has joined the channel_

Hey Angel, please meet Chris your incredible E-Mentor I've been telling you all about :smile:.  Feel free to introduce yourselves and continue chatting within this channel. :wave:

I will now be leaving the channel, but both please direct message myself or emma-prospela if you have any questions. All the best for now! :slightly_smiling_face:
_@dexter has left the channel_
_@dexter has left the channel_

Hi Chris lovely to connect with you in person. 

My name is Angel and I do hard surface modelling. I'm looking to improve my skillset in this feild, and to get some guidance on how to do it.
Thank you for allowing us to connect, I'm excited to start this mentoring and showing my work.
Hi Angel. Nice to meet you.
How about we start with you tell me a bit about your self, who you are, what you like making, what you do and want to achieve
What do you hope to get out of mentoring

Sure, I am 30 years old, I am based in London i like to keep proactive in modelling and keep up to date on new tools to improve on my work and as artist. I love films and i own blue rays and TV shows to, I like going to the gym and constantly keeping up to date with the industry.
I go cinema often, i love going to events and attending museums in my free time, I enjoy meeting new faces and growing. Looking to dive in with my work and i am extremely passionate about it

I love hard surface modelling, assets and anything else that comes along. I like to challenge myself as it helps me to improve and trying to explore other things along the way. Right now I'm doing a personal project and its a test I'm giving myself in order to see if i can hit the targets I have for it. I am very open to trying new things in modelling and excited when i get to try something new that I haven't done big or small.

I want to achieve to a senior level standard, it would be really great opportunity to go and explore more in this desired field I have. I want to grow in this area and excel at it, everyday I try to strive that by choosing assets to rebuild from real life and see how I can achieve it to VFX standards.

What I am hopping to get out of mentoring is a better understanding of the modelling pipeline department, I want to have a better workflow in modelling, improve quality in the work to an exceptional level and get a position in this desired field with the new knowledge i'll gain being mentored .
